entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "null-conditional assignment" #75554
  • Action `Convert to full property` generates erroneous code for semi-auto properties #75547
  • `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function seems incorrect #75543

Closed

  • IntelliCode suggestion stuck and never goes away #75408
  • IDE0001: False Positive for default primary constructor #75026
    Backlog
  • Handling of infinite collection initialization chains could be unified #75024
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75555
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dispose of ITextDocument(s) when closing preview view #75551
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ClrOnly condition is not working on mono #75548
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Access services on Solution rather than workspace in Razor cohost (Roslyn OOP) scenarios #75545
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Disable retaining PR val builds #75552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add ETW events when ALCs are created or disposed #75550
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove references to torn analyzers #75533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Speculative changes to PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax #75546
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move `#if NET` directives forward #75500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove comment for Obsolete on Index or Range #75531
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Platform documentation #75540
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.12
  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run binary SDL once on all artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr
  • Fix incremental parsing error with dot-dot tokens. #75532
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
